name: Class Changed(gmcp)
script:
ak.classenable()
if wsys then  
   monkenemy = {}
   if gmcp.Char.Status.class ~= "Monk" or gmcp.Char.Status.race:match("Dragon") then
      wsys.monkstance = false
   end 
   if ndba and gmcp.Char.Status.class ~= "Monk" then 
      enemylist = enemylist or {}
      if #enemylist > 0 then
         for i = 1, #enemylist do
            if ndba.isashtani(enemylist[i]) then
               send("unenemy "..enemylist[i])
               table.insert(monkenemy, enemylist[i])
            end   
         end
      end
   end
end
enableTrigger("Trait Gag Out")
send("trait list known")
disableTrigger("Class Changed(gmcp)")
enableTrigger("Class Changed Prompt Lock")
matches: ^Your draconic form melts away, leaving you suddenly weaker and more vulnerable.$
^With an ear-splitting roar, you rear back your draconic head and scream out your triumph.$
^Reveling in your total mastery of the form, you beat your mighty wings, throw your massive head back
You are not in Dragon form.
You already maintain the form of the Dragon.
You are now a member of the
On and on, your soul cascades upon the currents that now sustain your form.
With a cursory thought, you still your clamorous heart and arise whole, gazing out from within your
Your elemental might has already overtaken your form.
You pray to the spirits of the fallen for a fresh chance at life, and are reincarnatedinto
You switch your martial school to that of Shikudo.
With a victorious roar, you bellow your triumph into the firmament.
